document_data.Abilities: Gofus was a [[gnome]] and a proficient fisher and netter. They knew how to use [[dagger]]s when the need to defend themselves arose. The fisher lacked in strength but was a charismatic individual who spoke several languages: [[Common]], [[Dwarvish]], [[Gnomish]], [[halfling language|Halfling]], [[Goblin language|Goblin]], and [[Kobold language|Kobold]].
